content: in this legal case the court has ruled in favor of atradius credit insurance nv and dissolved the community of individuals involved a technical consultant has prepared a divisional project to divide the real estate assets into two lots and the court has approved this plan the court has ordered a drawing of lots to assign the respective lots to the parties involved the defendants have been ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings and the courtappointed technical consultancy as well as the court costs to the creditors the plaintiffs request for the division and sale of the assets has been granted and the defendants have agreed to the dissolution of the community and the subsequent sale of the assets other defendants and interveners have made various requests and declarations in response to the plaintiffs claims the court has made a final ruling on the case declaring the dissolution of the community and approving the divisional project the court has also ordered the payment of costs and fees to the parties involved the ruling was made on january 4 2016 and filed in the clerks office on january 7 2016
